Traits.Name: Hampering Toxins
Traits.Description: When a character is poisoned by a Siren, they also become Dazed.

Traits.Name: Disorienting Magic
Traits.Description: A hostile character who successfully saves while in range 4 of a Siren is slow until the end of the characterâ€™s next turn.

SetupTraits.Name: Monsters
SetupTraits.Description: Sirens do not flee or negotiate.
